# Basic Usage

## Installation

To install ballroomify:

```console
(.venv) $ pip install ballroomify
```

## Documentation
```{eval-rst}
.. autoclass:: dances.Style
    :members:

.. autoclass:: dances.Dance
    :members:
    :special-members: __init__

.. autoclass:: dances.InternationalStandard
    :members:
    :special-members: __init__

.. automodule:: main
    :members:
```
